amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for the purchase of water to supplement or enhance instream water flow requirements in California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for the purchase of water to supplement or enhance instream water flow requirements in California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A058) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 183 (Roll no. 211).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A058) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 183 (Roll no. 211).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A058) offered by Mr. McClintock.
